body:
### Describe the bug

The development branch of cython fails to build blosc2 with this error  

```
    [287/289] Generating blosc2_ext.c
      FAILED: [code=1] blosc2_ext.c /tmp/tmp_3tpq57y/build/blosc2_ext.c
      cd /tmp/tmp_3tpq57y/build && /home/tcaswell/.virtualenvs/cp315t/bin/python3 -m cython /tmp/pip-install-9lmh_w66/blosc2_b4787ab9e7c44645be8ca9c6384382e6/src/blosc2/blosc2_ext.pyx --output-file blosc2_ext.c

      Error compiling Cython file:
      ------------------------------------------------------------
      ...
              if BLOSC2_USER_REGISTERED_CODECS_START <= cparams.compcode <= BLOSC2_USER_REGISTERED_CODECS_STOP\
                      and cparams.compcode in blosc2.ucodecs_registry.keys():
                  raise ValueError("Cannot use multi-threading with user defined Python codecs")

              ufilters = [BLOSC2_USER_REGISTERED_FILTERS_START <= filter <= BLOSC2_USER_REGISTERED_FILTERS_STOP
                        for filter in cparams.filters]
                        ^
      ------------------------------------------------------------
      /tmp/pip-install-9lmh_w66/blosc2_b4787ab9e7c44645be8ca9c6384382e6/src/blosc2/blosc2_ext.pyx:768:18: Compiler crash in IterationTransform

      ModuleNode.body = StatListNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:11:0)
      StatListNode.stats[56] = StatListNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:761:0)
      StatListNode.stats[0] = CFuncDefNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:761:0,
          args = [...]/1,
          c_compile_guard = '',
          modifiers = [...]/0,
          node_positions = [...]/68,
          outer_attrs = [...]/2,
          visibility = 'private')
      CFuncDefNode.body = StatListNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:762:4)
      StatListNode.stats[0] = IfStatNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:762:4)
      IfStatNode.if_clauses[0] = IfClauseNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:762:7)
      IfClauseNode.body = StatListNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:763:8)
      StatListNode.stats[1] = SingleAssignmentNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:767:19)
      SingleAssignmentNode.rhs = ComprehensionNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:767:19,
          has_local_scope = True,
          is_temp = True,
          result_is_used = True,
          use_managed_ref = True)
      ComprehensionNode.loop = ForInStatNode(blosc2_ext.pyx:768:18)

      Compiler crash traceback from this point on:
        File "/home/tcaswell/.virtualenvs/cp315t/lib/python3.15t/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Visitor.py", line 174, in _visit
          return handler_method(obj)
        File "/home/tcaswell/.virtualenvs/cp315t/lib/python3.15t/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Optimize.py", line 219, in visit_ForInStatNode
          return self._optimise_for_loop(node, node.iterator.sequence)
                 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
        File "/home/tcaswell/.virtualenvs/cp315t/lib/python3.15t/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Optimize.py", line 247, in _optimise_for_loop
          optimised_node = self._try_optimise_array_iteration(node, unpacked_iterable, env, reversed=reversed)
        File "/home/tcaswell/.virtualenvs/cp315t/lib/python3.15t/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Optimize.py", line 265, in _try_optimise_array_iteration
          return self._transform_carray_iteration(node, iterable, reversed=reversed)
                 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
        File "/home/tcaswell/.virtualenvs/cp315t/lib/python3.15t/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Optimize.py", line 759, in _transform_carray_iteration
          stop = ExprNodes.IntNode.for_size(slice_node.pos, slice_node.type.size)
        File "/home/tcaswell/.virtualenvs/cp315t/lib/python3.15t/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 1552, in for_size
          return cls.for_int(pos, int_value, type=PyrexTypes.c_py_ssize_t_type)
                 ~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
        File "/home/tcaswell/.virtualenvs/cp315t/lib/python3.15t/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 1547, in for_int
          assert isinstance(int_value, int), repr(int_value)
                 ~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
      AssertionError: 'BLOSC2_MAX_FILTERS'
      ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.
```

but builds correctly with the released version of cython.  I bisected this to https://github.com/cython/cython/pull/7339 

### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

```sh
pip install --no-build-isolation blosc2 --no-cache-dir
```

fails with the development branch of cython

### Expected behaviour

_No response_

### OS

linux

### Python version

cpython main branch (freethreaded and with GIL)

### Cython version

development branch 

### Additional context

_No response_

rename.to: [BUG]: changes to static arrays breaks blosc2 compilation

title: [BUG]: changes to static arrays breaks blosc2 compilation
